1.content:
Alex sat in the classroom, sweating. He was just about to get his final exam back for the class and he had no idea how well he'd done. And to make things worse, his hands were itching like crazy! The teacher had handed the exams out in reverse alphabetical order so of course he was last... Everyone else had already left. At least that would save him some embarresment if he had failed the exam.

All his worries were for naught however, as he had not only passed, but had earned a solid B minus! Grinning and thanking his teacher, he left the classroom to find his friend Sarah waiting outside for him. Everyone else had already left the building. "Alex! That grin tells me you have good news!" She said as soon as she saw him. His hands were no longer itching, but now they had a strange tickly feeling that was almost as annoying. "Sure do! I made a B!" Alex replied, grinning even wider. "Awesome! Gimme a high five!" Sarah was energetic all the time, and would probably have asked for the high five even he had failed the exam. But being in the good mood that he was, Alex decided to oblige her. As soon as his hand touched hers however, there was a blinding flash, and when Alex could see again, Sarah was gone! Her clothes were laying there on the floor, but she was nowhere to be seen! "Uuuhhh... Sarah? Hello?" At first Alex heard nothing in reply to his question, but after a moment he thought he could hear a tiny squeeling sound coming from in front of him. He knelt down and began shifting through Sarah's clothes, a bit embarrased as he moved her undergarments, and sure enough, there sat Sarah. Tiny, naked, and understandably freaking out Sarah.

"Alex!!! What did you do to me!?" She screamed at him. Alex wasn't sure, but he picked her up and set her on his palm and lifted her up. He blushed slightly as he realized she was naked and trying her best to cover herself. He went into an empty classroom nearby and got a tissue, ripping off a small piece of it and handing it to her. She did the best she could to wrap it around herself, but it clear that it would be a temporary solution at best. "Alex!!! Help me!!! Change me back!!!" she screamed at him again. "But I don't know how! I'm not even sure I did this to you in the first place!" He replied, obviously frustrated. Sarah meanwhile, continued to freak out. Alex's mind raced, trying to figure out how to undo whatever he had done. He could tell his teacher about it and see if he could help, but who knows how he would react to this? On the other hand, Alex could take her home and try to help her on his own. Surely there was a way to undo whatever had happened. Or, he could not help her at all and just use her for his own benefit. No matter what he decided, he'd need to get rid of her clothes so as to not arouse suspicion.
1.title: Electric hands

12.content:
Alex decides to help his friend out, even though it was tempting to keep the tiny seventeen-year-old college freshman this small for a wide variety of twisted reasons. Alex grabs the tiny blond haired girl and runs out the door with her firmly in hand. As he walks over to Professor Henry Watkins office, he could feel the nearly naked girl moving around in his cupped hands and she feels kind of like a small animal or a decent size bug moving around to him. He rather felt like King Kong, as he enters the Professor’s office. As Alex stands in the Professor’s Office Alex sees him sitting behind his desk. Their Professor is thirty-five years old, and he has a slim, muscular body, with a thick mustache. He also has short, neatly cut black hair, tan skin, and he wears glasses. Henry teaches science at the University, specifically biology and zoology to the freshman and sophomore level students, and Alex is a student of his.

While Alex stands there, Henry asks him, “What the matter? If it’s about your B please be aware that you would have gotten an A if you had not missed those five classes this semester.”

“No sire, and thank you for the great grade,” Alex says smiling, “But I have a problem. I sort of found something you might find fascinating, and you might be able to help me?”

“Well what is it?” Henry says impatiently.

Alex did not say anything. Instead, he just decided to show Sarah to Henry. Alex bends down and places Sarah on his desk. The Professor’s eyes suddenly got huge, and he had a look of shock on his face. Henry at first thought that Alex was shoving a very small, pink colored doll or action figure on his desk and he thought it was some kind of weird, sick joke. Then he sees that the blond haired doll, which has a tissue around it, is moving, and it appears to be the most life like doll that he has ever seen. Henry than looks closer to make sure that his eyes are not fooling him, and he sees that this tiny girl is real, and she looks just like seventeen-year-old Sarah Winchester, another one of his students. She is so beautiful he thinks to himself. Her figure is so slender, but curvy, and what little of her breasts that he could see is perky, and large. She is a perfect specimen of a human female he thought, and now for some mysterious reason she is tiny, and nearly naked on his desk.

If only there was a tiny male to breed her with, and start a new species, homotiny he thought to himself. It would be like having a tiny Adam and Eve under his control, and he would be like a god, or something. Henry was not gay, but he did enjoy watching a guy drill a girl. To him the girls are the real star of the show, guys are only there as a prop, extra meat only. Then a thought crosses Henry’s mind quickly, I wonder what it would be like to eat Sarah, or eat Sarah as she is forced to make love to a tiny guy. As long as a girl was involved, he would consider eating a couple, but never a single guy, no way. Anyways, Alex tells Henry everything, so the Henry...
12.title: Alex tells his Professor!

info.brief_description: Alex suddenly discovers that he has the ability to shrink people. (Primarily a vore story)
info.description:
This is an interactive story based primarily on macro/micro vore. The main character, Alex, has the ability to shrink people. What he does with them after that is up to you.

RULES:
All characters should be at least 16 years of age, and preferably under 30. As with many other rules, I will make exceptions on occasion as long as they don't become too prevalent. (Note: There are NO exceptions on characters being below 16, only above 30.)

Oral softvore and unbirth only. No hardvore, no cockvore, etc. Unbirth should only be done with shrunked targets. Oral vore with non-shrunken targets is permitted but should be kept to a minimum as I have a different story with that as it's focus (check my portfolio if that's what you want).

No m/m same size sex. M/F sex and F/F sex are fine and encouraged regardless of size. M/M sexual contact with a shrunken victim is permitted but should not become prevalent in the story.

Chapters should be of a decent length. Most extremely short chapters will be deleted except in the case that I determine that the chapter was necessary for some reason.

Spelling and grammar should be at least decent. I'm not going to be too tough on this one because I'm not great at it myself, but try to at least spell properly and use SOME punctuation. Chapters with horrible spelling and/or grammar will usually be taken down, unless I think it's a particularly good chapter in which case I will let you know and give you some time to revise it before I delete it.

ALEX'S ABILITIES:
Basically, Alex can shrink people. He CANNOT grow people, but he can return them to their original size, or set them to any size between their current and original sizes.

Alex can shrink himself too if he wants, but he can return to his normal size at any time he wishes.

Alex can only shrink people, not objects or clothes. So if he shrinks someone, their clothes remain the same size.

OTHER PEOPLE'S ABILITIES:
I will allow one other person with abilities similar to Alex's in a thread. Preferably a female but that is not required.

No one is immune to being digested, even Alex. The only reason someone should survive being swallowed is if they escape soon after.

Other than all that, anything goes. Have at it people! And don't forget to add!
